submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], tar: List[int]) -> int:
        def func(A):
            res = pre = 0
            A = [abs(i) for i in A]
            for a in A:
                res += max(a - pre, 0)
                pre = a
            return res
        n = len(nums)
        dif = [tar[i] - nums[i] for i in range(n)]
        # print(dif)
        arr = []
        t = []
        s = dif[0] > 0
        for i in range(len(dif)):
            # print(s, dif[i] > 0)
            if s == (dif[i] > 0): t.append(dif[i])
            else: 
                # print(t)
                arr.append(t)
                t = [dif[i]]
                s = dif[i] > 0
        # print(t)
        arr.append(t)
        # print(arr)
        ans = 0
        for i in arr:
            ans += func(i)
            # print(i, func(i))
        # print("----")
        return ans
